summary: Is Skyrim\'s main theme not heavy enough for you? Then replace it with youtube user 331erock\'s intense metal cover. A simple but rocking mod for those of you who occasionally just like to sit and listen to the menu. (My first mod of any game, but it works perfectly, NexusModManager ready too!)
descriptionHtml:
Is Skyrim\'s main theme not heavy enough for you? This simple mod replaces the original title theme with a metal version (331erock). This is my first \"mod\" I\'ve ever made for any game, but I made sure that it works and everything.

Installation:
---------------
Automatic:
Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Manual:
Extract the 7zip folder to your Skyrim directory.
author: Warhero229
